trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around June 18th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was on my way home from work while i was riding on the midway orange line. over by the 35\archer orange line station,(near the stevenson expwy. i happened to look out the window, facing the southwest horizion. all of a sudden, i've seen a silvery disk shape object not too far off from a distance, hovering low over the horizion, dazzling like it was doing a dance, then slowly moved away heading towards west. then there was this military jet air-craft following this disk shape object, not knowing both of where they went. it happen all within in a 3 minunte duration time within about 30 secounds, i called (*name deleted--sgonzalez\cms)and told him what i had seen and explain it to him in details. i'm not sure if this was an illusion or some kind of a reflection? or was it this the for real ufo sighting?
Summary: Thought I seen a disc shape object by 35th and Archer Ave.
